metadata.description: Discover the story behind Glow. We build beautiful, minimalist loyalty software for artisans who value craft and community.

hero.title: Elegant Loyalty for the Intentional Maker
hero.subtitle: Our Craft, Your Community

story.title: The Narrative
story.paragraph1: At Glow, we believe that software should be as beautiful as the products you create. Most loyalty platforms are built for corporations—cluttered with complex dashboards and intrusive pop-ups that distract from your brand's soul.
story.paragraph2: We built Glow for the independent artisan. By leveraging a high-performance stack—Next.js, Neon, and Vercel—we offer a "quiet" technology that stays in the background, allowing your craftsmanship to shine.
story.paragraph3: Our mission is simple: help makers build deeper connections with their communities through elegant, distraction-free loyalty experiences.

performance.title: Zero-Drag Performance
performance.description: Optimized for speed so your store remains fast and responsive.

aesthetic.title: Aesthetic Integration
aesthetic.description: Digital membership cards designed to live beautifully in your customer's Apple or Google Wallet.

focus.title: Artisan Focus
focus.description: We don't just provide points; we provide a connection that deepens your community.
